title: Small Development Project Grant Assistance by the Government of India to Develop the Faculty of Agriculture and the Faculty of Engineering at Kilinochchi, University of Jaffna
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, for the amended Memorandum of Understanding between the Government of India and the Government of Sri Lanka, to develop the Faculty of Agriculture and the Faculty of Engineering at Kilinochchi, University of Jaffna, was approved by the Cabinet.
